BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker has a circular dependency with other classes
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker.isConditionTypeCacheable(ShardingConditionValue) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker.load(ShardingRouteCacheableChecker$Key) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker.checkInsertCacheable(InsertStatementContext, List, ShardingSphereDatabase) needlessly boxes a boolean constant

org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker.checkDeleteCacheable(DeleteStatementContext, List, ShardingSphereDatabase): 1st parameter 'statementContext' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.statement.SQLStatementContext instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker.checkShardingConditionsCacheable(List): 1st parameter 'shardingConditions' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker.checkUpdateCacheable(UpdateStatementContext, List, ShardingSphereDatabase): 1st parameter 'statementContext' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.statement.SQLStatementContext instead

new org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker$Key(ShardingSphereDatabase, String, SQLStatementContext, List): 4th parameter 'params' could be declared as java.util.Collection instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.checker.ShardingRouteCacheableChecker$Key.hashCode() stores return result in local before immediately returning it
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sharding.cache.route.cache.ShardingRouteCacheKey.hashCode() stores return result in local before immediately returning it
